title: AI Firms Should Adopt KYC Policies to Combat Misuse, Microsoft Exec Suggests
description: Microsoft President Brad Smith suggests banking-style identity verification could stem abuse and misinformation.

title: Fortress CEO Clears the Air on Security Breach and Stolen Funds
description: Scott Purcell admits that “shit happened”—but says Fortress and Ripple handled things well.

title: Champions Arena Beginner's Guide: How to Start Playing the NFT Fantasy Game

title: Friendtech Generates $6.4M+ in Fees Under 30 Days of Launch
description:
In a recent tweet, NFTgators, a trusted resource for NFT enthusiasts, spotlighted significant milestones of the recently launched Social-Fi app Friendtech. According to the tweet, Friendtech has surpassed 80,000 Ethereum (ETH) tokens in total inflow. NFTgators highlighted that the significant growth stemmed from over 3.7 million transactions. Moreover, the report captured that the high transaction […]

The post Friendtech Generates $6.4M+ in Fees Under 30 Days of Launch appeared first on Coin Edition.
